with pytest.raises(ValueError, match=
    'variance of the Gaussian likelihood must be strictly greater than'):
    _ = gpflow.likelihoods.Gaussian(variance=0.0, variance_lower_bound=
        init_lower)
pytest.mark.parametrize('init_lower', [0.0, 1e-06, gpflow.likelihoods.
    Gaussian.DEFAULT_VARIANCE_LOWER_BOUND])
